thread.title: Apple Is Leading the Market Once Again - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Ben Eisen
title: Apple Is Leading the Market Once Again - MoneyBeat - WSJ

organizations.name: nra convention pull focus to school

text:
0 COMMENTS Apple is helping pull the stock market higher.
The technology giant, which experienced volatility for much of the year as investors fretted about demand for its mobile phones, made a big run higher in recent days after the company’s latest earnings report helped put those worries to rest .
Also aiding the rally: the announcement of a $100 billion buyback program, and Warren Buffett‘s disclosure that Berkshire Hathaway reased its stake in the company.
